name: Kinton Ramen
comment: Their chefs should all go on a trip to Japan to learn how to make REAL ramen.

name: McDonald"s
comment: I thought fast food was suppose to be cheap. Like I shouldn"t be spending more than $10-12 on a meal. But I always go over $15.

name: Jacobs & Co. Steakhouse
comment: Ridiculous price on menus. I wonder if they wrote calories instead of price.
